stream_defs.default: v4l2_capture name=capture s=@APP.CAM0@ ! mjpeg_tegra_decoder name=decoder cudamem=1 ! pcuda_remapper name=remapper dup=1 edge_r="0.1" s=@APP.SIZE@ ! pipe name=encoder t=H265

default.encoder.def: gst-launch-1.0 -q fdsrc ! rawvideoparse width=@IWIDTH@ height=@IHEIGHT@ framerate=30/1 format=i420 ! omxh265enc iframeinterval=300 bitrate=4000000 control-rate=2 ! h265parse ! video/x-h265,stream-format=byte-stream,alignment=nal ! fdsink
